extension.description:
CW Article Gallery Package FREE

Fast and Simple Image Gallery for Joomla Articles

Package of plugins for allowing you to create easily an image gallery right inside the article edit!

STEP 1. Go to Extensions -> Plugin Manager -> and PUBLISH these plugins:

  • CW Gallery Content: Main plugin
  • CW Gallery Ajax Upload: Plugin for ajax upload functionality
  • Button - CW Gallery: Plugin for adding a Button into WYSIWYG Editor

STEP 2. Set parameters in CW Article Gallery Plugin

STEP 3. In Article Edit view will be added new Tab "CW Gallery"

THIS IS FREE VERSION - WITH BACKLINKS AND LIMITED TO 3 IMAGES PER ARTICLE. IF YOU LIKE THE PLUGIN, SUBSCRIBE HERE FOR PRO VERSION

For more informations see documentation here.
